joke:
Jokes 3 Knock Knock
Who's there?
Alva!
Alva who?
Alva heart!

Knock Knock
Who's there?
Alvin!
Alvin who!
Alvin a great time, how about you?

Knock Knock
Who's there?
Allan!
Allan who!
Allan-d of Manhattan!

Knock Knock
Who's there?
Allegra!
Allegra who?
Allegra is broken!

Knock Knock
Who's there?
Alma!
Alma who?
Alma-ny Knock Knock
